description: Detecting suspicious error log events which may lead to potential security threats
name: Anomaly detection for Apache Tomcat
query: path: "/home/cyber/research/tomcat/28_caused_by.log" and message: "IntrospectionUtils: Assert: Illegal params" or message: "Failed to trigger creation of the GC Daemon thread during Tomcat start to prevent possible memory leaks. This is expected on non-Sun JVMs."
